content: While a conversation with Jurvetson would likely make the average person’s brain hurt a little, there is a certain humility about him. Case in point: during the LIVE Chat, he texted his son for his opinion on a Product Hunt community member’s question. He’s always open to learning—even from his own kid. 📚💡It comes as no surprise, then, that Jurvetson was named by Forbes as one of “Tech’s Best Venture Investors” and appointed a Presidential Ambassador for Global Entrepreneurship by President Barack Obama in 2016. No big deal. 🙌
